Download & install inference

Prerequisites

Inference requires a recent version of Python; we are currently developing it with Python 3.8. It heavily relies on packages in the PyData ecosystem. We recommend installing an using Inference within a conda environment. Our current development environment is defined as follows: 


$ conda create -n py38infd python=3.8 anaconda

To install the package in your environment, activate the environment and run "pip install ." inside the "package" directory. If you intend to help develop inference code, instead use "pip install -e .", which will install the package in "editable" mode, so that modifications to Python code (but not extension code) in the downloaded package will immediately propagate to your Python environment.
